concept.title: CMM support for EIR enhancements (Feature f11309-02)
concept.shortdesc: This feature enhances the EIR error handling and offers a new choice of only rejecting the UE attach when the Equipment-Status AVP in the ME Identity Check Answer (ECA) message from the EIR is denylisted.

conbody.p: When this feature is enabled and there is no provisioned EIR or no EIR connection to send the ME Identity Check Request (ECR) message, no change is made to the MME behavior.

When this feature is enabled and the MME times out waiting for the ECA, or receives a success or an error ECA from the EIR, the MME rejects the UE attach when the Equipment-Status AVP is denylisted. For all other cases, the MME allows the UE to attach.
